lead_paragraph: Chelsea made the most emphatic statement yet about their Premier League title credentials as they forged clear at the top of the table with a dramatic, chaotic and emotional 3-1 win at Manchester City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Chaos as Chelsea Signal Intent With Win at Man City
headline.main: Chaos as Chelsea Signal Intent With Win at Man City

snippet: Chelsea made the most emphatic statement yet about their Premier League title credentials as they forged clear at the top of the table with a dramatic, chaotic and emotional 3-1 win at Manchester City on Saturday....
